channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- Micro Focus ArcSight Logger
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- Micro Focus ArcSight Logger

item.title: CVE-2022-26330|2024-08-03T05:03:31.777Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20arcsight%20logger
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in Micro Focus ArcSight Logger. The vulnerabilities could be remotely exploited resulting in Information Disclosure, or Self Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). This issue affects: Micro Focus ArcSight Logger versions prior to v7.2.2 version and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-26331|2024-08-03T05:03:32.278Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20arcsight%20logger
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in Micro Focus ArcSight Logger. This issue affects: Micro Focus ArcSight Logger versions prior to v7.2.2 version and prior versions.
